hero.title: Welcome to HelpLab!
hero.subtitle: Discover everything you can do on this collaborative platform for sustainable innovation.

path.title: Your journey on HelpLab
path.subtitle: Grow with us
path.text: On HelpLab there is no single way to participate. You can start as a citizen, become a judge through experience, contribute to the community, involve sponsors and support challenges economically.

challenges.title: Join a Challenge
challenges.subtitle: Take action now
challenges.text: Challenges are concrete actions with environmental and social impact, rooted in local territories. Join a local or thematic challenge and turn your commitment into measurable results.

judge.title: Become a Judge
judge.subtitle: Give value to your impact
judge.text: Judges ensure that every action is verifiable, transparent and properly evaluated. You analyze evidence, assign points and help make results credible.

sponsor.title: Involve a Sponsor
sponsor.subtitle: Enable impact
sponsor.text: Challenges can be supported by companies, institutions and foundations. Sponsors gain visibility, social value and impact reports for ESG goals.

learning.title: Follow Learning Paths
learning.subtitle: Learn with the community
learning.text: HelpLab will offer free learning paths on sustainability, social innovation and active citizenship to boost your skills and impact.

community.title: Contribute to the Community
community.subtitle: Build relationships
community.text: HelpLab is a community that grows through the exchange of ideas, feedback and skills. Join and help build a collaborative ecosystem.

cta.title: Ready to start your journey on HelpLab?
cta.subtitle: Choose where to begin: explore active challenges or complete your profile to build your role in the community.
